articles.headline: Tyrese Haliburton's injury prompts reactions from LeBron, Mahomes
articles.description: LeBron James led reactions from around the sports world as others sent their best wishes for Haliburton.

articles.headline: Pacers' Tyrese Haliburton exits Game 7 with Achilles injury
articles.description: Pacers star Tyrese Haliburton was helped off the court in the first quarter of Game 7 with what his father told ESPN is an Achilles injury.

articles.headline: Myles Turner: Haliburton's injury 'a heartbreak'
articles.description: Myles Turner reacts to Tyrese Haliburton's noncontact injury in the first quarter.

articles.headline: 2025 NBA Finals: Thunder guard Jalen Williams leads Game 7 arrivals
articles.description: The respective stars of the Oklahoma City Thunder and Indiana Pacers dressed accordingly for Game 7.

articles.headline: Carlisle reacts to video of OKC's championship buses
articles.description: Rick Carlisle dismisses the first question of his pregame news conference to speak on Oklahoma City's already-prepared championship buses.

articles.headline: Ryan Kalkbrenner's NBA draft profile
articles.description: Check out some of the stats that have made Ryan Kalkbrenner a top NBA draft prospect.
